title: Yōkai Ningen Bem
resume:
Yōkai Ningen Bem is a 26 episode Japanese anime television series which first aired on Fuji TV between October 7, 1968 and March 31, 1969, on its 19:30–20:00 timeslot.
The series was later remade into a second anime TV series, which premiered on April 2006 in Japan on Animax, featuring a new cast, with a total of 26 episodes also produced. The remake was also later aired by Animax across its other international networks, including its English language networks in Southeast Asia and South Asia, for which Animax produced an English dub under the title Humanoid Monster Bem. This dub was later aired on Animax's United States web channel on Crackle.com.
A live action television drama adaptation premiered on NTV on October 22, 2011. A film was released in December 15, 2012.
